critique: The executive order appears to be a legal document about land withdrawal in Nevada. It doesn't seem designed to evoke strong emotions. The primary goal is to communicate a legal action. Therefore, the scores for all emotions should be relatively low. I will set joy, sadness, fear, disgust, and surprise all to 1 initially. After further consideration, I don't think any emotion is intended to be conveyed, so I will revise all scores to 1.
